So, we don't know why this doesn't work in a advanced/VPC setup. As we don't have those it's difficult to test.

We've looked through the code and all we do is delay a restart of dnsmasq and Apache, but otherwise they are still restarted.

This delay could be the main issue for a VPC, but I can't tell.

Maybe it could be a very simple if/else statement, but right now we are not sure.

Technically we can fix this in 4.11 as well, the VR is just very, very slow. Afaik we are the only ones currently hit by this issue.

Maybe @ustcweizhou has an idea? Otherwise I wouldn't know
